verbs.description: happy ending for [ARG1: kitten] [V: found] [ARGM-PRD: glued to road] there no more appropriate name for chuck hawley new kitten than sticky the tiny furball thought to be no more than 8 weeks old was stuck in the middle of a road covered in glue when oregon hawley spotted it while traveling from silverton to salem around 7 am friday as salem salem statesman journal chuck hawley oregon sticky
